channel.title: facebook on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in facebook on Silviu's Blog

item.title: Digikam 2.0.0 Export to Facebook not compiled / missing
item.description: I’m had finally found the time to upgrade to digikam 2.0 stable. I noticed that Export to Facebook it’s not getting compiled. Long story short you need qjson installed. I used sbopkg -ki qjson and now digikam is happy!
